education.title: Bachelor of Science
details: Majors: Marketing and Finance
3.96 GPA, Dean's List Fall 2020-Spring 2023
Relevant Coursework: Marketing Research, Social Media and E-Marketing, Advanced Business Statistics
Participated in Study Abroad (Summer 2023) to Harlaxton, England studying marketing concepts

skills: Talented with Microsoft Word, PowerPoint, and Excel
Skillful in public speaking and presentation
Excels in individual and team settings
Social media content creation and management

experience.title: Marketing Specialist
experience.organization: Wake Up! Pueblo / Snooze Mattress Company
details: Created engaging and unique (static) social media content and managed multiple social accounts.
Developed and adhered to unique brand imagery/guidelines to create promotional materials.
Built and managed an online Shopify store with shopping integrations and product pages.
Evaluated website performance and implemented SEO techniques to increase traffic and conversions.
Managed social media accounts, increasing followers and user engagement through strategic content planning.
Prepared regular performance reports for clients to showcase campaign results and optimization areas.
Developed email campaigns for promotions, product releases, and updates.
Created comprehensive marketing strategies aligned with business goals.
Developed and optimized Google Ads and social media advertising campaigns.

experience.title: Hasan School of Business Tutor
details: Tutored students in basic and advanced statistics, principles of finance, and basic Java code.
Collaborated with students to complete assignments, identify lagging skills, and correct weaknesses.
Developed student confidence through positive reinforcement strategies.
Assisted students in reaching targeted performance levels through individualized coaching.

experience.title: Shift Supervisor
details: Managed shift operations and monitored team performance to keep business running smoothly.
Delivered successful training to more than 15 employees, educating on successful work processes and productivity strategies.
Developed and implemented new processes and procedures to streamline operations.
